mapper.select: select * from review where diner_code=#{diner_code} order by review_code desc;
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(review_code+1),1) from review
insert into review (review_code,user_id, diner_code, review_content, review_score) values (#{review_code}, #{user_id}, #{diner_code}, #{review_content}, #{review_score})
mapper.select: select IFNULL(round(avg(review_score),1),0) from review where diner_code = #{diner_code}
mapper.update: update diner a inner join review B on a.diner_code = b.diner_code set a.diner_review_count = a.diner_review_count+1 where a.diner_code = #{diner_code}
